argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | joincl.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | joincl.j | |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) |
| 3 |  | joincl.k | |- ( ph -> K e. V ) |
| 4 |  | joincl.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 5 |  | joincl.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) |
| 6 |  | joincl.e | |- ( ph -> <. X , Y >. e. dom .\/ ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( lub ` K ) = ( lub ` K ) |
| 8 | 7, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_joinval | |- ( ph -> ( X .\/ Y ) = ( ( lub ` K ) ` { X , Y } ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_joindef | |- ( ph -> ( <. X , Y >. e. dom .\/ <-> { X , Y } e. dom ( lub ` K ) ) ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ph -> { X , Y } e. dom ( lub ` K ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 7, 3, 10 | #P_lubcl | |- ( ph -> ( ( lub ` K ) ` { X , Y } ) e. B ) |
| 12 | 8, 11 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ph -> ( X .\/ Y ) e. B ) |
